definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The equivalence relation is the basic Concept of the rough set theory.
sentences.chinese: 等價關係是粗集理論中的一個重要概念。

sentences.english: Bisimulation is often chosen as the equivalence relation in equivalence checking.
sentences.chinese: 在等價驗證中，通常選擇互模擬作爲等價關係。

sentences.english: Fuzzy cluster based on equivalence relation is one of the methods of cluster analysis.
sentences.chinese: 基於等價關係的模糊聚類是聚類分析中的一種。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the equivalence relation between the DEA model and the game model.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要討論DEA模型與對策模型之間的等價關係。
